column2: If toggled on, original textures (should they exist) will be replaced with textures from custom directory per model converted

column1: 使用已链接到 .blend 文件的纹理
column2: Use textures already linked to .blend file

column2: Set a custom texture image type for exported models without affecting resolution of original/source texture files

column1: (%) 支持有损压缩的图像格式的质量
column2: (%) Quality for image formats that support lossy compression

从修改后的网格导出 UV
column2: Export UVs from the modified mesh

column1: 选择导出 UV 贴图的目录
column2: Select directory into which UV layouts will be exported

column1: 设置导出 UV 贴图的自定义目录（默认为 // 将导出到与混合文件相同的目录（仅在混合文件已保存的情况下有效））。
column2: Set a custom directory to which UV maps will be exported\nDefault of // will export to same directory as the blend file (only works if the blend file is saved)

column1: 选择 UV 贴图导出时的组合方式
column2: Select how UV layouts should be combined upon export

column1: 导出 UV 贴图的文件格式（透明度仅适用于 PNG、EPS 和 SVG）
column2: File format to export the UV layout to \n(Transparency only works for PNG, EPS, and SVG)

column1: 设置导出 UV 布局的不透明度（在 0.0 和 1.0 之间）
column2: Set amount of opacity for export UV layout \n(between 0.0 and 1.0)

column1: 在导出前设置导入对象的自定义变换
column2: Set custom transformations of the imported object(s) before exporting

column1: 对所有对象应用所有变换
column2: Apply all transformations on all objects

column1: 过滤转换过程中应用的变换
column2: Filter transforms to apply during conversion

column1: 使用动画。 如果切换为关闭，动画将被删除
column2: Use animations.  If toggled off, animations will be deleted

column1: 设置导出时使用的单位系统
column2: Set the unit system to use for export

column1: 设置导出时使用的长度单位
column2: Set the length unit to use for export

column1: 设置最大文件大小，Transmogrifier 会自动尝试缩小每次导出的文件大小
column2: Set a maximum file size and Transmogrifier will automatically try to reduce each export

column1: 如果低于目标值，则跳过现有模型
跳过优化 1) 已存在和 2) 已低于目标文件大小的模型
column2: Skip optimizing models that 1) already exist and 2) are already below the target file size

column1: 过滤要自动优化的模型
column2: Filter models to be automatically optimized

column1: 设置 Transmogrifier 应尝试缩小每个转换文件的阈值
column2: Set the threshold below which Transmogrifier should attempt to reduce each converted file

column1: 用于自动优化缩小文件大小的筛选方法
column2: Filter methods to use for auto-optimize file size reduction

column1: (仅用于 glTF/GLB 导出）。尝试使用 Draco 压缩来降低导出文件大小
column2: (Only for glTF/GLB export). Try Draco-compression to lower the exported file size

column1: 尝试调整纹理大小以降低导出文件大小
column2: Try resizing textures to lower the exported file size

column1: 尝试将除法线贴图外的所有纹理重新格式化为 JPEG 格式
column2: Try reformatting all textures except the normal map to JPEG

column1: 尝试缩小对象尺寸以降低导出文件大小
column2: Try decimating objects to lower the exported file size

column1: Draco 压缩级别（0 = 最快速度，6 = 最大压缩，目前不支持更高数值）
column2: Draco compression level (0 = most speed, 6 = most compression, higher values currently not supported)

column1: 设置自动文件大小不得低于的最小图像纹理分辨率。图像不会被放大
column2: Set minimum image texture resolution for auto file size not to go below. Images will not be upscaled

column1: 限制物品被分解的次数。物品每次将减少 50
column2: Limit the number of times an item can be decimated. Items will be decimated by 50% each time

column1: 将转换后的模型标记为资产（为每个导入/转换的模型保存一个混合文件）
column2: Mark converted models as assets.\n(Saves a Blend file for each model imported/converted)

column1: 选择包含资产的混合文件的质量。质量基于每个项目中保存资产混合文件的时间。
column2: Select the quality of the Blend files containing assets. Quality is based on when asset Blend files are saved during each item

column1: 选择要存档的资产类型
提取每种资产类型的预览图像缩略图，并以 PNG 格式保存到磁盘（仅适用于可生成预览的资产）。
column2: Extract a preview image thumbnail for each asset type and save to disk as PNG.\n(Only works for assets that can have previews generated.)

column1: 筛选要提取图像预览到磁盘的资产类型。
column2: Filter asset types from which to extract image previews to disk.

column1: 允许复制已存在于所选资产库中的资产。
column2: Allow duplicate assets that already exist in the selected asset library.\n(i.e. Mark duplicates as assets)

column1: 筛选在所选资产库中已存在的资产类型时，哪些资产类型可以标记为重复资产。
column2: Filter which asset types can have duplicates be marked when assets of those types already exists in the selected asset library

column1: 在导入混合文件时，只将主集合标记为资产，而忽略其他集合。（对于转换的每个项目，所有对象都会移动到与项目名称相匹配的主集合中。）
column2: When importing a blend file, mark only the master collection as an asset and ignore other collections.\n(For each item converted, all objects are moved to a master collection matching the item name.\nThis option is only relevant when importing .blend files that may already contain collections.)

column1: 筛选要标记为资产的对象类型。
column2: Filter which object types to mark as assets.\nNot all will be able to have preview images generated

column1: 将转换后的资产归档到选定的库中
column2: Archive converted assets to selected library

column1: 将转换后的资产分配到选定的目录
column2: Assign converted assets to selected catalog

column1: 设置包含资产的混合文件的存储位置
column2: Set where the blend files containing assets will be stored

column1: 将所有使用过的外部文件打包成 .blend
column2: Pack all used external files into .blend

column1: 为转换后的项目添加元数据
为用户显示的资产描述
column2: A description of the asset to be displayed for the user

column1: 该资产的发布许可类型。许可证名称为空并不一定表示该资产不受许可条款限制。如果需要说明，请联系作者
column2: The type of license this asset is distributed under. An empty license name does not necessarily indicate that this is free of licensing terms. Contact the author if any clarification is needed

column1: 该资产的版权声明。版权声明为空并不一定表示该资产无版权限制。如需任何说明，请联系作者
column2: Copyright notice for this asset. An empty copyright notice does not necessarily indicate that this is copyright-free. Contact the author if any clarification is needed
Name of the creator of the asset

column1: 为资产添加新的关键字标签。标签之间用空格隔开
column2: Add new keyword tags to assets. Separate tags with a space

column1: 在所有自定义脚本之间同步某些触发器设置
column2: Synchronize some trigger settings between all custom scripts

column1: 设置何时触发自定义脚本
column2: Set when custom script should be triggered

column1: 保存给定导入目录中批量转换的 CSV 摘要。该摘要记录了每个已转换模型的统计信息
column2: Save a CSV summary of the batch conversion in the given import directories. The summary records statistics about each model converted

column1: 筛选要记录在日志摘要 CSV 中的其他属性。
column2: Filter additional properties to document in the log summary CSV.\nImport file + format, export file + format will always be recorded

column1: 将批量转换的 TXT 日志保存在给定的导入目录中。日志会记录转换过程中的每一步，这对排除转换错误或 bug 非常有用
column2: Save a TXT log of the batch conversion in the given import directories. The log records each step of the conversion process, which is invaluable for troubleshooting conversion errors or bugs

column1: 设置用于记录模型尺寸的单位系统
column2: Set the unit system to use for logging model dimensions

column1: 设置用于记录模型尺寸的长度单位
column2: Set the length unit to use for logging model dimensions

column1: 用于记录模型尺寸的长度单位
column2: The length unit to use for logging model dimensions

column1: 设置模型边界框的 X 尺寸
column2: Set a bounding box X-dimension a model

column1: 设置模型 Y 维度的边界框
column2: Set a bounding box Y-dimension a model

column1: 使用预设的导入设置（在文件 > 导入菜单的导入设置中创建）。
column2: Use import settings from a preset.\n(Create in the import settings from the File > Import menu

column1: 预设导入操作符选项字典
column2: Dictionary of import operator options from preset

column1: 预设导出操作符选项字典
column2: Dictionary of export operator options from preset

column1: 自定义输出目录。\默认值为 // 将从与混合文件相同的目录导入（仅在混合文件已保存的情况下有效）
column2: Custom output directory. \nDefault of // will import from the same directory as the blend file (only works if the blend file is saved)

column1: 过滤纹理贴图以调整大小
显示/隐藏自定义脚本设置

column2: Path to a Python script file

column1: 放置 Transmogrifier 附加组件用户界面的位置
